title: Wives and daughters
creator_credit: Nicholas Renton, Sue Birtwistle and BBC
brief_description: A 19th century soap opera of splendid proportions. A story of a father remarrying for the sake of his daughter. The complications begin. A new step mother, a step sister and a selfish governess, the story unfolds. Elizabeth Gaskells unfinished novel adapted to a satisfying and beautiful series. Cast includes Michael Gambon, Francesa Annis and Ian Carmichael.
